Episodes.Title: Space Pilot 3000
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: A down-on-his-luck pizza delivery guy is accidentally frozen on New Year's Eve 1999 and wakes up in the year 3000.

Episodes.Title: The Series Has Landed
Episodes.Director: Peter Avanzino, Rich Moore, Gregg Vanzo
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Ken Keeler
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: For the crew's first mission, they must make a delivery to the moon, which is now home to a cheesy amusement park.

Episodes.Title: I, Roommate
Episodes.Director: Bret Haaland, Rich Moore, Gregg Vanzo
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Horsted
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry is forced to choose between friendship and television when Bender's antenna impairs TV reception at their stylish new apartment building.

Episodes.Title: Love's Labours Lost in Space
Episodes.Director: Brian Sheesley, Rich Moore, Gregg Vanzo
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Brian Kelley
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: While on a mission to save animals from a doomed planet, Leela finds herself the object of a starship captain's amorous advances.

Episodes.Title: Fear of a Bot Planet
Episodes.Director: Peter Avanzino, Carlos Baeza, Rich Moore
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Evan Gore
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry and Leela disguise themselves as robots to find Bender after he fails to return from a delivery to a robot planet, only to learn that he has become a celebrity in a culture which fears humans.

Episodes.Title: A Fishful of Dollars
Episodes.Director: Ron Hughart, Gregg Vanzo, Rich Moore
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Patric M. Verrone
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Fry discovers his bank account interest has made him a billionaire and buys the one thing the year 3000 doesn't have: anchovies.

Episodes.Title: My Three Suns
Episodes.Director: Jeffrey Lynch, Kevin O'Brien, Rich Moore
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, J. Stewart Burns
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Delivery Boy Philip J. Fry is promoted to Emperor after accidentally drinking his fluid-based predecessor.

Episodes.Title: A Big Piece of Garbage
Episodes.Director: Susie Dietter, Rich Moore, Gregg Vanzo
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Lew Morton
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: When a big ball of garbage from the 20th Century returns to threaten New New York, Philip is the only expert on making the weapon to fight it.

Episodes.Title: Hell Is Other Robots
Episodes.Writer: Matt Groening, David X. Cohen, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Billy West, Katey Sagal, John DiMaggio
Episodes.Plot: Bender joins a robot church after fighting an addiction to electricity, but reverts to his pre-addictive behavior of cigars, booze and robot hookers, leading to a musical confrontation with the Robot Devil.
